titles.title: Educator Tax Relief Act of 2015
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to improve and make permanent the above-the-line deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
6/25/2015--Introduced. Educator Tax Relief Act of 2015
Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the tax deduction for the expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers, to: (1) allow an inflation adjustment to the amount of such deduction for taxable years beginning after 2014, (2) allow the deduction of professional development expenses, and (3) make such deduction permanent.
